<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_shce_food_servic_food_function_requests</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate Day of Week for Food Svcs Req</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gdt = new GlideDateTime(current.function_date_time);
	current.setValue('function_date_of_the_week',gdt.getDay());

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DLADMIN</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-05 18:17:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>aa3264dfdb8a2890daa50825ca96198c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Day of Week for Food Svcs Req</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Event Management" source="x_shce_event_manag">8658dffadb02e490daa50825ca9619d7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Event Management">8658dffadb02e490daa50825ca9619d7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_aa3264dfdb8a2890daa50825ca96198c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DLADMIN</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-05 18:29:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=aa3264dfdb8a2890daa50825ca96198c"/></record_update>
